dialogue.string: 1�I am in charge of assigning missions to Bastokers who wish to serve their country. Are you one of them?
1�Have you come to undertake a mission?Yes, I have.No, maybe later.
1�Good.This is your first time going on a mission, is it not?
1�Your first assignment is not a difficult one.The details are as follows:
1�You must go to the Zeruhn Mines in the western section of the Mines District.Once there, you are to collect a report from the overseer.
1�You can consult the ??Mission?? section of the main menu to review your objectives.Speed and efficiency are your priorities. Dismissed.
1�Then move along.
1�Missions currently available are as follows:

1�Which mission will you undertake?The Zeruhn Report.A Geological Survey.Fetichism.The Crystal Line.Wading Beasts.The Emissary.2-3-1A.2-3-1B.2-3-2A.2-3-2B.The Four Musketeers.To the Forsaken Mines.Jeuno.?_?~?[.Darkness Rising.Xarcabard, Land of Truths.Return of the Talekeeper.The Pirates' Cove.The Final Image.On My Way.The Chains That Bind Us.Enter the Talekeeper.The Salt of the Earth.Where Two Paths Converge.?_?~?[?P?O.?_?~?[?P?P.?_?~?[?P?Q.?_?~?[?P?R.?_?~?[?P?S.?_?~?[?P?T.?_?~?[?P?U.None.
1�The Chief Engineer is conducting new research, and has asked for someone to assist him.He can be found in the Metalworks, to the east of the administrative section.
1�The Chief Engineer's laboratory is on the second floor of the Metalworks.You don't know his name!? And you call yourself a Bastoker!
1�The Chief Engineer's name is Cid. Any Bastoker would know that!Now go and see him. He will give you the details of your mission.
1�The Palborough Mines, once our main source of mythril, have been under beastman control for some time.
1�We want you to hunt these beastmen, the Quadav, and bring back  $????,  $????,  $????, and  $???? as proof of your accomplishments.
1�You must present all four items to me or one of my colleagues in order to complete this mission.
1�Have you heard of a strange structure called the Crag of Dem? It is on the Konschtat Highlands, north of the Gustaberg Mountains.
1�They say that crystals are drained of their power if you take them to a certain section of that structure.
1�Chief Cid is currently investigating this strange phenomenon, and is asking for someone to bring back a faded crystal.
1�Go see him for a more detailed explanation of your objectives.
1�You want a crystal to use for this experiment? Are you not an adventurer? It should be easy for you to procure one.
1�You are to collect  $???? from beasts in the Dangruf Wadi.
1�Senator Alois is in need of some. Do not ask me why.He can be found in the President's Office.
1�You've acquired quite a reputation.There is a new mission for you to tackle.
1�First, speak to Sir Naji of the Mythril Musketeers at the President's Office.This mission is of great import to the welfare of our nation.
1�I see you've made it back safely from your journey to Windurst and San d'Oria.This new mission should not be hard for an experienced adventurer like you.
1�The Mythril Musketeers are planning an offensive on the Quadav stronghold.
1�Adventurers, including yourself, have been asked to join them on this operation.
1�You are to go meet Iron Eater, one of the Mythril Musketeers, to receive a full briefing.
1�The Gusgen Mines in the Konschtat Highlands have been dug to the bare rock and abandoned for some time...
1�But lately, there have been reports that a rare ore can be found in them.No one has claimed this new vein yet.

1�You are to bring back a sample of the ore to confirm these reports. A Galka adventurer named Davyad should be able to help you. He is said to have acquired a chunk of the ore when he was there last.
1�The item that Davyad brought back was  $????. That is what you should seek as well.Once you have the ore, hand them over to me or one of my colleagues.
1�You have heard of Jeuno, have you not? The Bastokan government is currently looking for someone to send there, and your name is on the list of candidates.
1�The presidential aide, Sir Lucius himself, recommended you. It is a great honor--you should be proud!
1�Sir Lucius wishes to see you as soon as possible. Go meet him in his office in the administrative section at the top of the Metalworks.
1�I have orders for you from the president himself.You must have heard already, but he wants you to go to Fei'Yin.
1�Go speak to Sir Naji at the President's Office.He will show you in.
1�So, it has finally come to this... You are to infiltrate the Kindred's main stronghold of Zvahl.
1�The president will brief you himself in his office.Good luck, adventurer!
1�There has been some commotion in the Mines District near Ore Street. People are saying that a new Talekeeper has appeared.
1�It sounds fishy to me, but with the disappearance of their elder, Werei, anything could be possible. And the last thing we want is an uprising by the Galka.
1�Go to Ore Street and talk to Medicine Eagle. He says he was there when the commotion started.
1�I assume an adventurer of your caliber has heard of Norg.
1�Well, the place is a haven for pirates. They even have ties with the Tenshodo. In any case, it's an area that cannot be looked upon lightly.
1�That is why we want you to travel there as an emissary. Report to Sir Naji in the President's Office for details.
1�Currently, Chief Engineer Cid is conducting research on the architecture in Ro'Maeve near the Sanctuary of Zi'Tah. Your next mission is to travel there and assist him.
1�Report to the Chief Engineer in the Metalworks for further details.
1�We are searching for an adventurer holding vital information dealing with a certain national investigation.
1�The president himself has expressed great interest in this case. Proceed to the President's Office for the details of this mission.
1�It looks like Bastok is really going to begin an investigation of the Galka homeland of Altepa.
1�Your role in this investigation will have you traveling to the Quicksand Caves. Get the details of this mission from Iron Eater in the President's Office.
1�As a continuation of Bastok's investigation of Altepa, this time you will be traveling to Zepwell Island.
1�You will be carrying out your part of the investigation in the Kuftal Tunnel, which connects Cape Teriggan to Zepwell Island. Report to Drake Fang in the Zeruhn Mines for details.
1�Senator Alois has asked for your assistance.
1�It is something about an expedition to Vollbow...
1�I just hope he's not asking you to go get lizard eggs again... Wait, you didn't hear me say that.
1�Recently, an adventurer who was sent to investigate the Northlands has been attacked.
1�According to her report, the attacker resembled the dark knight Zeid.
1�The strange thing is that the attacker passed a letter to the adventurer before letting her go. Now, this letter's content is causing quite a commotion in the President's Office.
1�You have been asked to report directly to President Karst for further details.
1�Will you accept this mission?Yes.No.
1�You cannot undertake two missions at the same time.Finish the one you are on now before asking for a new one.
1�I am in charge of assigning missions, but I am only allowed to do so to those whose allegiance is to Bastok.
1�Good, you've brought all four parts of the doll.
1�I am raising your rank to 2 for completing this mission.Congratulations.
1�If you've been to the Palborough Mines, you must know now the serious nature of the threat these beastmen pose to our civilization.
1�As a Bastoker, you are expected to take on more missions and go on conquests to preserve Bastok's brilliant future!
1�But I cannot give you a new mission at this time.
1�You need to collect rank points before taking on new missions.
1�You can receive rank points by participating in conquests and donating the crystals you acquire to guards, or by undertaking missions you've previously completed.
1�Ask the High Guard near the gatehouse if you wish to hear more about conquests.
1�Good, you've brought all four parts of the doll.
1�You have succeeded in bringing back  $????.Good work, adventurer. This discovery may help rejuvenate Bastok's economy!
1�Ah, you have returned from Jeuno.Go to the President's Office right away.Sir Naji will show you in.
1�Good, you've brought all four parts of the doll.
1�I am raising your rank to 2 for completing this mission.Congratulations.
1�If you've been to the Palborough Mines, you must know now the serious nature of the threat these beastmen pose to our civilization.
1�As a Bastoker, you are expected to take on more missions and go on conquests to preserve Bastok's brilliant future!
1�But I cannot give you a new mission at this time.
1�You need to collect rank points before taking on new missions.
1�You can receive rank points by participating in conquests and donating the crystals you acquire to guards, or by undertaking missions you've previously completed.
1�Ask the High Guard near the gatehouse if you wish to hear more about conquests.
1�Good, you've brought all four parts of the doll.
1�Ch...Chief Cid!
1�No sir!There has been an increase in the number of adventurers using the airship, as well as an all-around increase in exports, but no signs of any disturbances.
1�Truly, Chief Cid's wonderful innovations have brought wealth and prosperity to the Port Distr--
1�Sir?I stop in every day after my duties are complete, and business seems decent as usual...
1�I wonder what's wrong with Chief Cid.
1�Wow. Maybe Chief Cid's got a soft spot after all.
1�You have succeeded in bringing back  $????.Good work, adventurer. This discovery may help rejuvenate Bastok's economy!
1�Lady Ayame!What brings you to this area?
1�You've been ordered by the president to deliver that 3????. When you have completed that task, you can return here for your next mission.
1�As I've said, we have strict orders not to let you pass, Milady.It'll mean our heads if we let you go outside!
1�Well, uh...
1�Hey, what'd you go and upset her for?What if she tells the boss?
1�Phew...She's finally gone.
1�Why won't we let her go outside, you ask?Oh, you'll find out soon enough.
1�So, you're new in Bastok, huh?What are you thinking of doing first?
1�Hey, not so fast! It's dangerous out there!Well, if you really want to go outside, you can go back the way you came, through the gate. But don't come complaining to me if you get hurt.
1�If you do go, one piece of advice: ??check?? your target before fighting it, and only fight creatures you're sure you can beat. Got that?
1�Well, there are a few street vendors around...but if you want better stuff, you should go to the Markets District.
1�The stores there have a pretty good selection, but you don't look like you can afford to buy much from them now.
1�That's very vague. What kind of work are you looking for?
1�Ah, good! You've come to the right person. I'm the guard in charge of assigning missions--there's one of us at each gate.Since you seem so eager, I'll assign you one.
1�Don't worry, it's an easy one, even for a tenderfoot like you.All you have to do is collect a report from the overseer of the Zeruhn Mines.

1�Let me give you the directions:Cross the bridge southwest of here and go to the Bastok Markets. Once there, head south, and you'll be in the Mines District. The Zeruhn Mines are in the western section.
1�Did you get all that?If you get lost, just ask people along the way.
1�Ah, that's very commendable! There aren't enough people like you these days.
1�Why don't you start by helping that girl who was here earlier?
1�She's been frequently seen going to the Tenshodo warehouse west of here.I hope she doesn't get into trouble with them.
1�Money, huh? You might want to try the Steaming Sheep Restaurant, a tavern that caters to all sorts. One of their patrons might know something useful.
1�The tavern's a little ways west of here.You can't miss it.
1�Oh, and take this #????. Bring it to Dulsie. You can find her in front of the drawbridge. She'll help you out.
1�And this is where Dulsie is.Open the ??Map?? from the main menu on the right if you want to check it again.
1�How? After opening ??Map?? from the main menu, select ??Markers,?? and press the right arrow key.
1�Remember, if you want to give an item to someone, use ??Trade?? from the main menu.
1�That's it.I guess I'll be seeing you around!
1�Take it from me, a guard's job is pretty boring.Not that I'd rather have trouble, mind you.
4�Why!?Why won't you let me go outside!?
1�But why!?
1�Please, I'll only be gone a second!I have to help a friend!
1�Well, no, but...
1�Oh... Hi there. Were you there the whole time?Aren't I pitiful? Not even allowed out of the city gates by myself...
1�I'm sorry, I didn't mean to gripe.You look like a fledgling adventurer. Is this your first time in Bastok?
1�Welcome to Bastok, then.I'd show you around, but I'm a little busy right now...
1�Really?I thought you were a newcomer, the way you dress and talk...
1�Well, I've gotta go.I have to find a way to get outside these walls!
1�Parraggoh's already given you three out of the four you asked for! Why aren't you giving him his reward!?
1�I told you I can't!
1�Hey, haven't I seen you somewhere...
1�I remember now, you're the adventurer!Can I ask you a favor?
1�Hey, you look like...you're an adventurer, right?Can I ask you a favor?
1�Can you go get me  $?????I've heard that monsters in Gustaberg drop them.
1�Thanks!Talib, this person will bring you the last one, okay?
1�Thanks! I'll see you!
1�Oh, come on! Please?
1�Fine! I'll go ask someone else--someone who's not so selfish!
1�I finally found you, Mister Oggbi.
1�I heard about you from Degenhard in the Markets. He said that you were a master of the martial arts.
1�Oh, I'm sorry. I forgot to introduce myself.My name is Cornelia.
1�Yes...but not the Cornelia you know. That's why I came here.I would like you to tell me about her.
1�I knew it!You were Cornelia's instructor!
1�It's not that...
1�Why would you give her such a difficult...
1�I am 	, a Temple Knight.I am one of the guards charged with overseeing San d'Oria's conquest campaign.
1�I am 	, an Iron Musketeer.I am one of the guards charged with overseeing Bastok's conquest campaign.
1�I am 	, a War Warlock.I am one of the guards charged with overseeing Windurst's conquest campaign.
1�I am Jeunoan Ducal Guard, 	. My duty is to support the conquest efforts of Windurst, San d'Oria, and Bastok.
1�Adventurers from nations that are ranked higher than ours in the conquest race may purchase items from us, but at a higher rate.
1�Welcome back from the expedition. Our nation was successful in its campaign. Let me give you your reward.

1�What is your business?Would you cast Signet on me?I want to spend my conquest points. �[I want to join the Expeditionary Force./Teleport me to the E.F. area.]I want to quit the E.F./change my E.F.I want to go on a supplies quest.I have some questions...Nothing, sorry to bother you.
1�Currently we rank first in Vana'diel's conquest, but that must not be taken for granted. We must continue our fight to remain on top.
1�We had first place in our hands, but we let it slip away. If we want to be ranked first in Vana'diel, each and every one of us must do their part. I look forward to hearing of your achievements.
1�Our country has fallen to third in the conquest of Vana'diel. We must step up our efforts to improve the situation.
1�You must fight in battles that gain high levels of experience. This is the only way we can bring areas under our country's control.

1�You currently have 
� conquest points.Would you like to use them to purchase items?
1�Your rank is too low to purchase the #????.
1�You cannot currently purchase this item.Please choose another.
1�You do not meet the requirements to purchase the #????.

1�Due to its special nature, you can only purchase or recharge  $???? once until the conquest results tally is performed.Also, you cannot purchase this item if a similar item is already in your possession.
1�It is possible to fully recharge  $???? by trading it to one of your nation's guards, including outpost guards. One charge requires 50 conquest points.
1�It is possible to fully recharge  $???? by trading it to one of your nation's guards, including outpost guards. One charge requires 100 conquest points.
1�It is possible to fully recharge  $???? by trading it to one of your nation's guards, including outpost guards. One charge requires 200 conquest points.

1�During the time of the Great War, it was possible to have this item recharged in exchange for Allied Notes. From my understanding, that practice has recently become commonplace in the Near East. Though you'll be needing Imperial Standing credits if you wish to use the service there.
1�You do not have enough conquest points to purchase the #????.
1�You cannot equip the #????.Do you still wish to proceed?
1�Your level is too low to equip the #????.Do you still wish to proceed?
1�Are you sure you want to purchase the #?????
1�You seem to be able to equip the #????.Do you wish to proceed?
1�Proceed?Yes, purchase item.Cancel purchase.
1�Proceed?Yes, even though I can't equip it.Cancel purchase.
1�Currently our nation is dispatching Expeditionary Forces across Vana'diel, and requests the participation of brave adventurers such as yourself.

1�Requirements for participating in an E.F. are simple. Your party must consist of 
 members. Each member must be from this country, rank 3 or higher, and have reached a sufficient level.
1�Once your party is ready, come to me and I will teleport you to the nearest outpost.
1�There, you will receive an insignia of the Expeditionary Force. When you succeed in taking control of the area, you can exchange the insignia for your reward.

1�Which E.F. would you like to join?......The Zulkheim Region (Lv.20?`).The Norvallen Region (Lv.25?`)..The Derfland Region (Lv.25?`)..The Kolshushu Region (Lv.20?`).The Aragoneu Region (Lv.25?`).The Fauregandi Region (Lv.35?`).The Valdeaunia Region (Lv.40?`).The Qufim Region (Lv.25?`).The Li'Telor Region (Lv.35?`).The Kuzotz Region (Lv.40?`).The Vollbow Region (Lv.65?`).The Elshimo Lowlands Region (Lv.35?`).The Elshimo Uplands Region (Lv.45?`)...........None.

1�Join the E.F. in  [Ronfaure/Zulkheim/Norvallen/Gustaberg/Derfland/Sarutabaruta/Kolshushu/Aragoneu/Fauregandi/Valdeaunia/Qufim/Li'Telor/Kuzotz/Vollbow/The Elshimo Lowlands/The Elshimo Uplands]?Join the E.F.Not this time.
1�Your party doesn't have enough members, or some of the members are not in this area. Gather all those who are participating and return here.
1�One of your party members is not a citizen of this country. We do not allow any foreign participants in the E.F.
1�One of your party members has not achieved rank level 3. We cannot reveal any of our tactical strategies to those who have not shown their loyalty to our country.

1�One of your party members is below level 
. For the safety of the adventurer and those accompanying him or her, we cannot allow anyone below the limit to participate in the E.F.
1�I see that you are ready.I grant you permission to join the current Expeditionary Force. When you are ready to teleport to the outpost, talk to me once more.

1�Are you ready to be teleported to  [Ronfaure/Zulkheim/Norvallen/Gustaberg/Derfland/Sarutabaruta/Kolshushu/Aragoneu/Fauregandi/Valdeaunia/Qufim/Li'Telor/Kuzotz/Vollbow/The Elshimo Lowlands/The Elshimo Uplands]? Remember that party members who have not been granted permission to attend the E.F. will be left behind.

1�Teleport to  [Ronfaure/Zulkheim/Norvallen/Gustaberg/Derfland/Sarutabaruta/Kolshushu/Aragoneu/Fauregandi/Valdeaunia/Qufim/Li'Telor/Kuzotz/Vollbow/The Elshimo Lowlands/The Elshimo Uplands]?Ready!Wait just a minute...

1�When participating in an Expeditionary Force, concentrate your efforts on fighting foes that give you the most experience points. And don't forget to confiscate the contents of any beastman treasure chest you happen to come upon.
1�I will now hand you your insignia. Be sure to read the inscription on the back before you begin your duties.Once Signet has been bestowed upon you, prepare to be teleported.

1�Cancel your participation in the E.F. to  [Ronfaure/Zulkheim/Norvallen/Gustaberg/Derfland/Sarutabaruta/Kolshushu/Aragoneu/Fauregandi/Valdeaunia/Qufim/Li'Telor/Kuzotz/Vollbow/The Elshimo Lowlands/The Elshimo Uplands]?
1�Quit the E.F.?Yes.Change locations.No.
1�Are you sure?
1�Really quit the E.F.?Yes.No.
1�I see.If you ever wish to participate in the future, I will be waiting here to take your application.
1�You can only undertake one supply mission per day.Come back later.
1�We need you to bring supplies to the outpost border guards who are placed in regions under our control.
1�There is one outpost in each region. Select ??Region Info?? from the menu, and look for the areas with a small flag mark on the map. That is where they are.

1�Here are the supplies. Just give them to the guard at the outpost and your mission will be complete.Now, choose which outpost you want to go to. We give different rewards for each region, so choose carefully.
1�So be it.You have until the next conquest results announcement to complete this mission.Good luck.

1�What do you wish to know about?Nothing.Conquests.Conquest results.Donating crystals.Conquest points.The effects of controlling regions.Regions controlled by other nations.Regions under beastman control.

1�All three nations are striving daily to put more regions under their control. This is what we call ??conquests.?? You can take part in it and serve your country by defeating enemies while you have Signet cast on you.
1�Each region comprises several areas, and the nation that rids those areas of the most monsters gains control of the region.
1�Nations receive goods and resources from regions under their control.
1�So, the more regions we control, the richer our nation becomes.
1�Border guards are also placed in outposts within regions under our control.They are there to cast Signet on adventurers like yourself.
1�Once you have your nation's Signet, you will be able to acquire crystals from enemies you defeat.

1�Not only that, but you will also receive conquest points. You get more conquest points if you defeat enemies in regions that are not under your nation's control. These points can be used to purchase items from guards like myself.
1�So you see...conquests benefit nations and adventurers alike.We expect you to do your best to serve your country.

1�You can see the current state of conquests by selecting ??Region Info?? from the main menu.Conquest results in all regions are regularly recalculated, so you may want to check them from time to time.
1�Shops in our city will be selling different items according to our conquest rank.The Troupe Valeriano will also visit the nation that finishes first and bring a little joy to its citizens.
1�You can donate crystals to your nation once you achieve rank 2.Just trade them to guards like myself, and we will ensure they are sent to the proper place.
1�We would like you to donate crystals to your nation from now on.Just trade them to guards like myself, and we will ensure they are sent to the proper place.
1�You can acquire crystals by defeating enemies while you have your nation's Signet.Having Signet cast on you is also the only way of taking part in conquests.
1�Rank points will be awarded to you for each crystal you donate, and you may be offered new missions as your rank goes up.
1�You also receive rank points for completing missions.Complete missions and take part in conquests to raise your rank and serve your country.
1�You are awarded conquest points when you defeat monsters while you are taking part in conquests.Select "Region Info" from the menu to check your current number of conquest points.
1�You can purchase items from guards like myself with your conquest points, but be warned that the number of points you spend will be subtracted from your current total.

1�When conquest results are announced, you will be told which country controls the region you are in at that time. Sometimes regions may become neutral, or beastmen may even gain control of regions.
1�If we gain control of a region, border guards will be placed at its outposts to help adventurers like you.
1�Merchants will also be placed there, and goods from that region will find their way to the local shops here.
1�Gaining control of regions is the basic principle behind conquests. We need each of you to do your best, and bring our nation to the top of the ranks.
1�Of course, sometimes we lose regions to other nations...so we must try to take them back before the next conquest results are announced.
1�As an incentive, we will award you with more conquest points for defeating monsters in those regions.

1�But if we are allied with another nation, you will only be awarded the regular rate for defeating monsters in our allies' regions. On the other hand, we will award you with more points for fighting in the top-ranked nation's regions.
1�Our paramount concern lies in the beastmen gaining control of our regions.If too many of us are defeated in a region, the beastmen will gain control of it.
1�If this happens, not only is it a great blow to our pride, but you will be unable to acquire any crystals in that region.
1�The beastmen are a menace to all nations. If they rise to power, we must all unite and drive those vile creatures from that region.
1�I cannot help you. You should go find a guard from your own country.
1�Ah, you have brought us supplies. These will help us indeed. I thank you.
1�Hmm... These supplies you have brought us are too old to be of any use. We will dispose of them promptly.I do commend you for your effort. May you succeed next time.
1�What do you want?Would you cast Signet on me?I'd like to set my home point here.Nothing.
1�Take care when passing through, as this area is currently overrun with beastmen! Something must be done, or the enemy will have control of the entire region.
1�Currently, our country is the dominant force in this region. If we can maintain this level, control of this area will be ours.
1�Currently, our country is a major force in this region. However, we cannot take this for granted. If we let down our guard, we will surely lose control of the area!
1�Currently, our country has only minor influence in this region. We're counting on you to get us out of this hole we've dug ourselves into.
1�Currently, our country's influence in this area is minimal. If we do not act quickly, control of this region will certainly be taken by a rival country.
1�You know as well as we do, Milady.

1�Giving items to other people is called ??trading.??It is done by selecting ??Trade?? from the main menu on the right.
1�You must target the person either before or after selecting ??Trade.??Then just choose the items you wish to give the person when your inventory window appears.
1�??Trading?? is crucial to completing quests and missions, and also during conquests.Remember it well.
1�If you have  $???? in your possession, use ??Trade?? now to give it to me. I will hand you some starting gil in return.
1�Before you take on any fiends, there are a few things you should remember. First, always have weapons and armor equipped, and spells memorized from scrolls.
1�Second, always ??check?? your target before engaging it. Never take on a foe that seems too strong for you to defeat alone.
1�Third, when you are in a party, make it a habit to cast lots for your share of the party ??spoils?? after successfully defeating a monster.
1�Some people in town will ask you to do certain tasks for them. These are called ??quests.?? Complete them, and they should reward you for your efforts.
1�There are also tasks you can do for your country, known as ??missions.?? There is a guard at each gate charged with assigning them. Speak to the guards for more details.
1�Come to me if there is anything more you would like to know.

1�Have you ever been to Selbina? It's a harbor town a little way north of Bastok.Many adventurers go there to ride the ferry to Mhaura. You should go there someday.
1�I make a living trading goods with Selbina, you see. But lately, my shipments are having trouble reaching the place.
1�Apparently, an infestation of sand bats has been plaguing the trade route between Bastok and Selbina.
1�Say, could you do me a favor and beat those flying rats out of the way?If you bring me  $???? as proof you did your job, I'll be more than happy to pay you!
1�I can't believe a bunch of filthy flying rodents are the cause of all my troubles...
1�Aha! You did it! Good work!Finally, I can get back to business!
1�The more I think about it, the more those sand bats infuriate me. If you bring me more trophies like this, I'll be happy to pay you!
1�The more I think about it, the more those sand bats infuriate me. If you bring me more trophies like this, I'll be happy to pay you!
1�Do you want me to teach you about your Mog House again, kupo?

1�The basic rules of Brenner are as follows:
1�First, the participants divide into two teams. Each side's camp contains the same number of ??Flammen-Brenner.??
1�At the beginning of the match, half of each side's Flammen-Brenner will be ablaze with ??Flamme,?? or flame, while the other half will remain unlit.
1�Participants can seize a Flamme from the opposing side's Flammen-Brenner and carry it around the Isle.
1�The goal is to steal your opponent's Flamme and use them to light your side's Flammen-Brenner.
1�The side that succeeds in lighting all of its Flammen-Brenner will be declared the winner after a specified amount of time.
1�If neither side is victorious before the match ends, the outcome will be judged based on the score. The ??match score?? section of the rulebook contains more information on this subject.
1�Brenner is significantly divided into public and private matches. Official matches are held periodically according to level and feature general participation.
1�You cannot reserve the Isle when an official match is being held.
1�No items are necessary for participation, but a minor fee will be collected. You will be unable to participate if your level is too low.

1�The match outcome will be recorded unless the number of participants fails to exceed 
� members, or if there are fewer than 
 members in a match where the two sides' numbers differ. In such cases, the game will be considered a training match and will not be recorded.
1�Private matches require a reservation, and participation may be limited. The Master of Ceremonies (MC) can freely adjust the rules and control match proceedings.
1�??LS Liga?? is a form of private match. You can learn more about LS Liga by speaking to a Marshal.
1�A Flammen-Brenner is a device that contains a Flamme (flame). The Flammen-Brenner is covered by a grate that will open after taking a set amount of damage, exposing the Flamme.
1�The participants must utilize this chance to seize the Flamme before the grate recloses. Once the grate is closed, the Flammen-Brenner will begin recovering from the damage it has been dealt.
1�If you manage to open the opposing team's Flammen-Brenner and capture their Flamme, you should make haste to light one of the Flammen-Brenner on your side.
1�After a certain amount of time, the Flamme will burn out and the opposing team's Flammen-Brenner will be relit.
1�Also, please note that you cannot quicken your pace using any special abilities while you are in possession of a Flamme.
1�In the event that neither side fulfills the conditions for victory, the outcome of the match will be evaluated based on score.

1�Ten points are awarded to each side for every lit Flammen-Brenner, while one point is awarded whenever a Flamme is captured, used to light a Flammen-Brenner, or recaptured from an opponent. One point is also awarded for protecting the Flammen-Brenner for a certain period of time.
1�Like Ballista, quarry (/quarry) can be used while playing Brenner. Participants may use this ability to dig up Petras and temporary items.
1�However, unlike Ballista Petras, Brenner Petras have no effect on the match score. You can trade a Petra to a Pursuivant to recover your HP and MP at no expense to TP.
1�Sprint cannot be used while carrying a Petra. Also, please note that the scout ability cannot be used in Brenner.
1�Petras will be lost in the event of a KO, but can be carried over from one match to another.
1�The sprint (/sprint) ability can be used to increase the player's speed when not in possession of a Flamme or Petras.
1�In the event of a KO, you will be returned to your team's camp. However, recovery will take longer the more often you fall in battle.
1�In other words, you will receive a penalty if you fall immediately after recovering from KO. In addition, your TP will be reduced to zero and you will lose any Petras in your possession.

1�In addition to doubling up, you may also decline to roll the dice and stay with your current total (hold fast).

1�Once all the players have held fast, the game is over and the results are announced. The player closest to 11 is declared the winner and receives all the gil in the pot (the original participation fees of all the players).

1�The synergy furnaces you see around town are provided as a public service by the Bastokan Institute of Synergy Research, to ensure that no synergist is ever far away from the tools of their trade.
1�The synergist must provide his or her own 3????, as well as any materials to be used in the synergy process.Synergy furnaces themselves may be used free of charge.
1�Needless to say, only one party may operate any given furnace at once.
1�Fortunately, there are multiple furnaces installed throughout town.If the furnace before you is already in use, please seek out an unused one elsewhere, or wait patiently for your turn.
1�You may think of synergy as an evolved form of synthesis.It is a discipline full of heretofore unimagined possibilities, but one which demands consummate skill from its practitioners.

1�Like synthesis, synergy involves combining materials according to a prescribed recipe to yield oft-spectacular results.The rub is that each synergy recipe also dictates a certain elemental balance that must be achieved for the procedure to be successful.

1�This balance is achieved through skillful infusion of combustible elemental crystals that we synergists call ??fewell.??To begin the synergy process, you'll have to feed the furnace with fewell and get those flames burning!
